title: Spaghetti Carbonara
ingredients:
200g spaghetti,
100g pancetta,
2 large eggs,
50g parmesan cheese,
black pepper.
cooking_steps:
1. Boil the pasta.
2. Fry the pancetta.
3. Beat the eggs and mix with cheese.
4. Combine everything and serve.

title: Tomato Basil Pasta
ingredients:
250g pasta,
400g canned tomatoes,
fresh basil,
garlic,
olive oil.
cooking_steps:
1. Cook the pasta.
2. Sauté garlic, add tomatoes, and simmer.
3. Mix with pasta and add basil.

title: Chicken Curry
ingredients:
500g chicken,
1 onion,
2 tomatoes,
curry powder,
coconut milk.
cooking_steps:
1. Brown chicken.
2. Sauté onion, add tomatoes and curry.
3. Stir in coconut milk and simmer.

title: Vegetable Stir Fry
ingredients:
200g mixed vegetables,
soy sauce,
ginger,
garlic,
sesame oil.
cooking_steps:
1. Heat oil.
2. Add garlic, ginger, and vegetables.
3. Stir fry and add soy sauce.

title: Grilled Cheese Sandwich
ingredients:
2 slices of bread,
2 slices of cheese,
butter.
cooking_steps:
1. Butter the bread.
2. Place cheese between slices.
3. Grill until golden.

title: Vegetable Soup
ingredients:
1 onion,
2 carrots,
3 celery sticks,
vegetable broth,
herbs.
cooking_steps:
1. Chop vegetables.
2. Sauté onion, then add carrots and celery.
3. Add broth and simmer.

title: Beef Tacos
ingredients:
300g ground beef,
taco shells,
lettuce,
cheese,
salsa.
cooking_steps:
1. Cook beef with spices.
2. Fill taco shells with beef and toppings.

title: Chocolate Chip Cookies
ingredients:
100g butter,
100g sugar,
1 egg,
200g flour,
100g chocolate chips.
cooking_steps:
1. Cream butter and sugar.
2. Add egg and flour, then mix in chocolate chips.
3. Bake until golden.

title: Pancakes
ingredients:
200g flour,
2 eggs,
300ml milk,
sugar,
butter.
cooking_steps:
1. Mix all ingredients.
2. Pour batter onto a hot pan.
3. Flip when bubbles form.

title: Caesar Salad
ingredients:
Romaine lettuce,
caesar dressing,
croutons,
parmesan cheese.
cooking_steps:
1. Tear lettuce, mix in dressing, croutons, and cheese.
2. Serve chilled.

title: Shrimp Scampi
ingredients:
200g shrimp,
garlic,
butter,
lemon,
parsley,
pasta.
cooking_steps:
1. Sauté garlic in butter.
2. Add shrimp and cook.
3. Toss with pasta and parsley.

title: Banana Bread
ingredients:
3 ripe bananas,
100g sugar,
200g flour,
2 eggs,
baking powder.
cooking_steps:
1. Mash bananas.
2. Mix all ingredients.
3. Bake until a toothpick comes out clean.

title: Omelette
ingredients:
3 eggs,
bell pepper,
onion,
cheese,
salt.
cooking_steps:
1. Beat eggs.
2. Sauté veggies.
3. Pour in eggs and cook until set.

title: Stuffed Peppers
ingredients:
4 bell peppers,
200g ground beef,
rice,
tomato sauce.
cooking_steps:
1. Cook beef and rice.
2. Stuff peppers with mixture.
3. Bake until peppers are tender.

title: Crispy Fried Chicken
ingredients:
500g chicken,
flour,
spices,
oil.
cooking_steps:
1. Coat chicken with seasoned flour.
2. Fry in hot oil until golden.

title: Lentil Soup
ingredients:
200g lentils,
1 onion,
2 carrots,
vegetable broth.
cooking_steps:
1. Sauté onion and carrots.
2. Add lentils and broth.
3. Simmer until lentils are tender.

title: Quiche Lorraine
ingredients:
Pie crust,
4 eggs,
cream,
bacon,
cheese.
cooking_steps:
1. Whisk eggs and cream.
2. Add cooked bacon and cheese.
3. Bake until set.

title: Margarita Pizza
ingredients:
Pizza dough,
tomato sauce,
mozzarella cheese,
basil.
cooking_steps:
1. Roll out dough.
2. Spread sauce and cheese.
3. Bake until crust is golden.

title: Chili Con Carne
ingredients:
500g ground beef,
kidney beans,
tomatoes,
chili powder.
cooking_steps:
1. Cook the beef.
2. Add beans and tomatoes.
3. Simmer with chili powder.

title: Pesto Pasta
ingredients:
250g pasta,
basil pesto,
parmesan cheese.
cooking_steps:
1. Cook pasta.
2. Toss with pesto and cheese before serving.

title: Fruit Salad
ingredients:
Assorted fruits,
honey,
lemon juice.
cooking_steps:
1. Chop fruits.
2. Combine with honey and lemon juice.

title: Baked Ziti
ingredients:
Pasta,
marinara sauce,
mozzarella cheese,
ricotta cheese.
cooking_steps:
1. Cook pasta.
2. Mix with sauce and cheeses.
3. Bake until bubbly.

title: Apple Pie
ingredients:
Pie crust,
apples,
sugar,
cinnamon.
cooking_steps:
1. Slice apples.
2. Mix with sugar and cinnamon.
3. Bake in pie crust until golden.

title: Cucumber Salad
ingredients:
Cucumbers,
vinegar,
sugar,
dill.
cooking_steps:
1. Slice cucumbers.
2. Toss with vinegar, sugar, and dill.

title: Tuna Salad
ingredients:
Canned tuna,
mayonnaise,
celery,
onion.
cooking_steps:
1. Mix all ingredients.
2. Serve on bread or with crackers.

title: Rice Pilaf
ingredients:
Rice,
broth,
vegetables,
spices.
cooking_steps:
1. Sauté vegetables.
2. Add rice and broth.
3. Cook until rice is tender.
